statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, security_level FROM user_authentication WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE security_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, security_level FROM user_authentication ORDER BY security_level DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, security_level FROM user_authentication WHERE security_level > 2 ORDER BY security_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, security_level FROM user_authentication WHERE password_hash LIKE '%abc%' AND security_level < 5;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE security_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_authentication;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, security_level FROM users WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.access_time FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT username, security_level FROM users WHERE security_level > 2 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE security_level < 2 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT u.username, a.access_time FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.success = true
SELECT * FROM users_auth;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users_auth WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 10;
SELECT u.username, s.two_factor_auth FROM users_auth u JOIN security_settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users_auth;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM access_logs WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM security_settings WHERE two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT username, login_time FROM users_auth INNER JOIN access_logs ON users_auth.user_id = access_logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id JOIN user_role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_role_permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN user_role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_permissions.role_id
SELECT username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users
SELECT * FROM users_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users_auth WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users_auth WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users_auth WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT log_id, action, log_time FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
